Question
========

From a randomly drawn sample of 7 individuals, the length of the left and right arms was measured (in cm.):

  ------------ ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- left arm 68 67 70 79 65 70 75 right arm 69 76 69 80 66 73 76 ------------ ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ----

We want keys H~0~: μ(left) - μ(right) = 0. counter H~1~: μ(left) - μ(right) \< 0\. TRUE is the value of the test quantity?

Answerlist
----------

* -0.941
* -0.442
* -2.489
* -1.244

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* -0.941: Incorrect
-0.442: Incorrect
* -2,489: Correct
-1,244: Incorrect
